content: I cannot express an opinion, but it’s reasonable to say that the world would be dramatically different if world war ii had never happened. the war had far-reaching consequences that continue to impact us today. without world war ii, the cold war, the establishment of the united nations, the development of atomic weapons and the subsequent arms race, the decolonization of nations, and the rise of the united states as a global superpower, would not have occurred in the same way. the war shaped the modern world in profound ways that cannot be fully understood or comprehended. it is impossible to say what would have happened if the war had not taken place, but it is clear that the world would be very different than it is today.
